Package org.blockchainnative

Class AbstractContractWrapper<TContractInfo extends ContractInfo<?,TMethodInfo,TEventInfo>,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo<TParameterInfo>,TParameterInfo extends ParameterInfo,TEventInfo extends EventInfo<TEventFieldInfo,TEventParameterInfo>,TEventFieldInfo extends EventFieldInfo,TEventParameterInfo extends EventParameterInfo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.AbstractContractWrapper<TContractInfo,TMethodInfo,TParameterInfo,TEventInfo,TEventFieldInfo,TEventParameterInfo>
  • Type Parameters:
    TContractInfo - Concrete type of the ContractInfo expected by this contract wrapper
    TMethodInfo - Concrete type of the MethodInfo used by TContractInfo
    TParameterInfo - Concrete type of the ParameterInfo used by TContractInfo
    TEventInfo - Concrete type of the EventInfo used by TContractInfo
    TEventFieldInfo - Concrete type of the EventFieldInfo used by TContractInfo
    TEventParameterInfo - Concrete type of the EventParameterInfo used by TContractInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthereumContractWrapper, FabricContractWrapper
    public abstract class AbstractContractWrapper<TContractInfo extends ContractInfo<?,TMethodInfo,TEventInfo>,TMethodInfo extends MethodInfo<TParameterInfo>,TParameterInfo extends ParameterInfo,TEventInfo extends EventInfo<TEventFieldInfo,TEventParameterInfo>,TEventFieldInfo extends EventFieldInfo,TEventParameterInfo extends EventParameterInfo>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for smart contract wrappers.

    Using this class is optional. However, it provides many potentially useful functions found in smart contract wrappers.
    Since:
    1.0

                                                  java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Extracts a special argument from a contract method.
        Parameters:
        methodInfo - MethodInfo describing the contract method.
        name - name of the special argument to be extracted.
        arguments - arguments passed to the contract method.
        Returns:
        value of the special argument or null if no matching special arguemnt has been registered in the method info

        protected java.lang.Object[] extractContractMethodParameters​(TMethodInfo methodInfo,
                                                             java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Extracts the arguments that need to be passed to the corresponding smart contract method, i.e. the arguments which are not marked as special arguments.
        Parameters:
        methodInfo - MethodInfo describing the contract method
        arguments - arguments passed to contract method
        Returns:
        array containing only the arguments that need to be passed to the corresponding smart contract method

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        @RuntimeType
public java.lang.Object intercept​(@Origin
                                  java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                  @AllArguments
                                  java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Interceptor to be called when a method of the smart contract interface TContractInfo is invoked.
        Parameters:
        method - smart contract interface method which has been invoked
        arguments - arguments of the smart contract interface method
        Returns:
        result of the smart contract method converted to the correct declared return type

        protected java.lang.Object invoke​(TMethodInfo methodInfo,
                                  java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Utility method for calling smart contract methods and special methods.
        Parameters:
        methodInfo - MethodInfo describing the corresponding smart contract method.
        arguments - arguments of the smart contract interface method
        Returns:
        actual smart contract method result converted to the expected type
        See Also:

      • invokeMethod

                                                                              java.lang.Object[] arguments)
        Calling the actual smart contract method and converts its result to the expected type.
        Parameters:
        methodInfo - MethodInfo describing the corresponding smart contract method.
        arguments - arguments of the smart contract interface method
        Returns:
